Pre-Game Insights: England will see this series as a much-needed preparation for next year's ICC Champions Trophy in Pakistan.
The West Indies also had a forgettable white-ball tour to Sri Lanka, where they lost both the T20I and ODI series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Antigua pitch will have a good pace and bounce initially, which might help the team batting first.
As the match progresses, expect the spinners to come into the game more, with the average second-inning score here being less.
England have a great record at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, having won five of the seven games played.
